data.text: Whole situation is sad af and the way you get called a conspiracy theorist or crazy or insensitive to people dying is maddddd, ppl have so much pent up anger against people that are questionable of the situation and it's like why can't we chat without u going to extremes.

Literally telling people their governments are lying to them. How come these views haven't been debated on, you go online and there's bullshit "fact checking" everywhere. Why can't people make a decision for themselves instead of being forced into 1 narrative.
